GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v5.17.2
GSD.description:
PCI: Reduce warnings on possible RW1C corruption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 54054e4ea188d99cfcdaafc255477f51b296c655, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit fb26592301200dbbe4a9943fe188b57a46716900. For more details please see the references link.
